name: bj-xtageq
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cxp(c2, bj-ctag(c0)), cxp(c2, bj-ctag(c1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cxp(c2, bj-ctag(c0)), cxp(c2, bj-ctag(c1))))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(bj-ctag(c0), bj-ctag(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cxp(c2, bj-ctag(c0)), cxp(c2, bj-ctag(c1))))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(bj-ctag(c0), bj-ctag(c1)))
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cxp(c2, bj-ctag(c0)), cxp(c2, bj-ctag(c1))))

comment: The products of a given class and the tagging of either of two equal classes are equal. (Contributed by BJ, 6-Apr-2019.)
